title: Changing gate dimensions
vignette: Builders propose widening a Temple gate for easier access.

options.text: Keep original measurements to preserve tradition.
Approve the change for practical benefit.

title: New staircase to the altar
vignette: Priests suggest adding an extra staircase for safety.

options.text: Add it if it helps avoid accidents.
Do not alter the holy design.

title: Changing courtyard floor material
vignette: Replacing worn stones with modern tiles seems appealing.

options.text: Use modern materials for durability.
Retain original stones despite wear.

title: Adding seats for spectators
vignette: Crowds at festivals complain of fatigue while standing.

options.text: Install seating for public comfort.
Leave area clear to respect sacred space.

title: Adjusting height of walls
vignette: Some priests want lower walls for better views inside.

options.text: Keep them tall for modesty and security.
Lower them to engage the crowds more.

title: Widening the women's courtyard
vignette: During gatherings the women's section becomes overcrowded.

options.text: Expand it to accommodate everyone.
Maintain historic boundaries despite discomfort.

title: Shortcut through sacred area
vignette: Workers want to pass through the sanctuary to save time carrying supplies.

options.text: Prohibit shortcuts out of respect.
Allow if done quietly and quickly.

title: Storage of tools overnight
vignette: Laborers leave construction tools inside the Temple.

options.text: Remove them daily to avoid disrespect.
Permit storage to streamline work.

title: Using modern lighting in Temple halls
vignette: Electric lighting could help with nighttime ceremonies.

options.text: Install to ensure safety and clarity.
Stick with traditional oil lamps.

title: Decorative art on the walls
vignette: Artists propose painting scenes to inspire worshippers.

options.text: Allow tasteful artwork to beautify the Temple.
Avoid images to keep focus on service.

title: Expanding storage rooms
vignette: The treasurers request additional rooms for supplies.

options.text: Build more rooms for efficiency.
Keep the structure unchanged.

title: Raising the altar height
vignette: Some believe a taller altar would enhance visibility.

options.text: Elevate it to inspire awe.
Leave height as inherited from ancestors.

title: Separate entry for dignitaries
vignette: Leaders request a private gate for formal occasions.

options.text: Provide it to honour them.
Use the same gates to promote equality.

title: Adding signage for tourists
vignette: Visitors often get lost in the vast complex.

options.text: Post signs to guide them.
Rely on guides without altering walls.

title: Closing unused passageways
vignette: Some doorways are rarely used and require upkeep.

options.text: Seal them to save resources.
Keep them open as part of the historic plan.
